description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: the Children's Theatre "Rammbaff" in Hanover; Helmut Schmidt re-elected as Chancellor; the research centre of the Schering Company in Berlin; a settlement dating from pre-Christian times, Munster is the capital of Westphalia today; 600 youth hostels in Germany belonging to the International Youth Hostels Association; new Kandahar course for the alpine sport of Downhill racing.
